languages.text: "Говорят, что в своих нечистых проповедях они вещают о неких "трех скорбных фалангах перста, указующего путь к возмездию и единению".
"Apparently, their unholy sermons speak of 'the three sorrowful phalanges of a finger pointing the way to retribution and unity.'"
languages.original_text: "Говорят, что в своих нечистых проповедях они вещают о неких "трех скорбных фалангах перста, указующего путь к возмездию и единению".

traits.locale_text: "It is said that in their impure sermons they speak of 'three sorrowful phalanges of a finger pointing the way to retribution and unity'."
"It is said that in their impure sermons they speak of 'three sorrowful phalanges of a finger pointing the way to retribution and unity'."
"It is said that in their impure sermons they speak of 'three sorrowful phalanges of a finger pointing the way to retribution and unity'."
"It is said that in their impure sermons they speak of 'three sorrowful phalanges of a finger pointing the way to retribution and unity'."
"Apparently, their unholy sermons speak of 'the three sorrowful phalanges of a finger pointing the way to retribution and unity.'"
"Apparently, their unholy sermons speak of 'the three sorrowful phalanges of a finger pointing the way to retribution and unity.'"
"Apparently, their unholy sermons speak of 'the three sorrowful phalanges of a finger pointing the way to retribution and unity.'"

languages.text: «Por lo visto, sus blasfemos sermones hablan de "las tres falanges pesarosas de un dedo que señala al camino al castigo y la unidad"».
languages.original_text: "Apparently, their unholy sermons speak of 'the three sorrowful phalanges of a finger pointing the way to retribution and unity.'"

traits.locale_text: «Por lo visto, sus blasfemos sermones hablan de "las tres falanges pesarosas de un dedo que señala al camino al castigo y la unidad"».

languages.text: 「どうやら、彼らの邪悪な説教は、『三つの悲しみの指骨』の報復と団結を指している様です」
languages.original_text: "Apparently, their unholy sermons speak of 'the three sorrowful phalanges of a finger pointing the way to retribution and unity.'"

traits.locale_text: 「どうやら、彼らの邪悪な説教は、『三つの悲しみの指骨』の報復と団結を指している様です」

languages.text: “很显然，他们的邪恶布道中提到了‘三根悲伤的趾骨，指向通往复仇与团结的道路’。”
languages.original_text: "Apparently, their unholy sermons speak of 'the three sorrowful phalanges of a finger pointing the way to retribution and unity.'"

traits.locale_text: “很显然，他们的邪恶布道中提到了‘三根悲伤的趾骨，指向通往复仇与团结的道路’。”

languages.text: "Offensichtlich ist in ihren unheiligen Predigten von den 'drei leidvollen Gliedern eines Fingers' die Rede, die den 'Weg zu Vergeltung und Einigkeit' weisen."
languages.original_text: "Apparently, their unholy sermons speak of 'the three sorrowful phalanges of a finger pointing the way to retribution and unity.'"

traits.locale_text: "Offensichtlich ist in ihren unheiligen Predigten von den 'drei leidvollen Gliedern eines Fingers' die Rede, die den 'Weg zu Vergeltung und Einigkeit' weisen."

languages.text: « Apparemment, leurs sermons impies évoquent "les trois phalanges malheureuses d'un doigt indiquant le chemin de la vengeance et de l'unité". »
languages.original_text: "Apparently, their unholy sermons speak of 'the three sorrowful phalanges of a finger pointing the way to retribution and unity.'"

traits.locale_text: « Apparemment, leurs sermons impies évoquent "les trois phalanges malheureuses d'un doigt indiquant le chemin de la vengeance et de l'unité". »

languages.text: "Anlaşılan uğursuz vaazlarında 'intikam ve birliğe giden yolu aydınlatan, bir parmağın üç kederli kemiği' diye bir şeyden bahsediyorlarmış."
languages.original_text: "Apparently, their unholy sermons speak of 'the three sorrowful phalanges of a finger pointing the way to retribution and unity.'"
